casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Vernelle L. BULLOCK, Sr. No. 445P02-3. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 3, 2005. Daniel R. Pollitt, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Vernelle Lafarris Bullock, Sr. R. Stuart Albright, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of August 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of August 2005."
